name: bigv-portfolio-support
description: Viktor's portfolio site built with Clojure & Tailwind CSS

scripts.dev: exec concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run clj:build" "npm run css:dev" "npm run cljs:dev" "npm run preview" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run open"
scripts.build: exec concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run clj:build" "npm run css:build" "npm run cljs:build" "npm run preview" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run open"
